CustomField.description:
A list of SObject Names ( comma, semi-colon, whitespace or new-line delimited which will be disabled. Below are 3 examples, (1) Account, Contact, Lead (2) All (3) Account
Note, to disable ALL SObject Triggers, use 'All'. Names are case IN-SENSITIVE.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: A list of SObject Names ( comma,semi-colon,whitespace or newline delimited which will be disabled. Below are 3 examples, (1) Account, Contact, Lead (2) All (3) Account Note, to disable ALL SObject Triggers, use 'All'. Names are case IN-SENSIT
CustomField.label: Disable Triggers By SObject Name
